name: Slechtvalk
description: '''Slechtvalk''' (the Dutch word for [[peregrine falcon]]) is a [[Christian metal|Christian]] [[black metal]] band from the Netherlands, formed in 1999. Previously signed to Fear Dark Records and currently to Whirlwind Records, the group has released five albums, a split-CD with [[Kekal]], a single and a DVD. Their second album, ''The War That Plagues the Lands'', reached No. 2 at Lowland's Top 50 Metal Charts. Their third album, ''At the Dawn of War'', coincided with the release of a live-DVD, ''Upon the Fields of Battle'', a maxi single for "Thunder of War", and was named one of ''[[HM Magazine]]''{{'s}} "100 best [[Christian metal]] albums of all time". The band's fifth album, ''Where Wandering Shadows and Mists Collide'', was released on December 20, 2016.
